sentence: Governor Ron DeSantis recently gave a speech where he declared that "the student debt that is out there, almost 60% of it is graduate school debt."
author: Brad Slager
title: Fact-Checker's Own Website Proves DeSantis Accurate in 'Mostly False' Entry
